products.title: Bexley Zinc 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Introduce sutble shantung style weave fabrics into your interior styling with their contemporary bexley range. Product id: sdb-vtb1402 fabric colour: zinc material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes bexley zinc 89mm vertical blind in grey.

products.title: Bexley Cotton Vertical Blind

products.title: Bexley Zinc
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
